essay.question-text: The students discuss two possible options in a decision the woman has to make. Describe the decision. Then indicate which option you think is best, and explain why.
essay.sample-answer-text:
SAMPLE ANSWER
In this conversation, the woman and man are discussing whether or not it is best for the woman to move out of the dorm and into an apartment.
The woman is currently living in a dorm, and she's happy there. The man points out that it's less work to live in the dorm. This sounds like it might be good for her to stay in the dorm.
The reason she might consider moving to an apartment is that her roommates want to move to an apartment, and she wants to be with them. The man also points out that there is more freedom in an apartment.
I think that the most important issue is the woman's friends. It seems she is happy living in the dorm, and it's good for her to be in a place where she wants to live. However, I think it is more important for her to live with people she wants to live with, so she should consider moving to an apartment with her friends.
